issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: FSShell delete and FSShell rename should operate on symlinks, not their targets

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Currently,  we remove or rename a symlink in FSShell, symlink target is affected instead of symlink itself. However FileSystem#delete and FileSystem#rename can operate on symlinks rather than their targets.
FSShell should have consistent behavior as FileSystem on symlink remove and rename
fields.summary: FSShell Delete and Rename should operate on symlinks rather than their target
